name: Maling Madness
description:
This is our submission on Game Jam 2022 of Gamekita x Gametech PENS. We were given 48 hour to complete the game with the theme of "Play as the Villain"

Game made by TeamMadness. The team consist of:

  • Nico Dicky Hermawan - Game Designer, Programmer
  • Muhammad Jibril Wathon - Game Designer
  • Lantang Indrarto - Game Artist, Designer
  • Artama Adam Kiarsa - Composer / Sound Engineer
  • Gustavino Mahaken - Composer / Sound Engineer

Story:

In a peaceful village, there is a young couple named Aji and Shinta. Aji is a factory worker in the city who works every day from morning to evening with a salary that is only enough to live a month and Shinta is a student child of the Lurah. After 4 years of dating since they were still in school until graduation, Shinta suddenly changed her attitude towards Aji. Shinta becomes more indifferent and rarely wants to meet Aji.

One day, Aji who was on his way home from work in the city saw Shinta and another man who was none other than Rokib who used to be Aji's classmate who is now the CEO of a company derived from his father. Shinta and Rokib are seen hugging and walking into a hotel.

Disappointed, tired, and angry, Aji feels that poverty is what makes him lose Shinta, all the efforts he does feel completely unappreciated. Aji, who was wearing a black hoodie at the time, put his hood on his head making half of his face covered by shadows. Aji swears that he will become richer than anyone in any way no matter if it's lawful or unlawful for revenge against Shinta, namely by becoming a thief...
